meanings.definition: A large muscle at the front of the thigh, divided into four parts.
meanings.sent1: She felt a twinge in her quadricepses after running.
meanings.sent2: Athletes often focus on strengthening their quadricepses for better performance.
meanings.sent3: The quadricepses of the marathon runner were not amused by the sudden sprint.
meanings.sent4: His quadricepses were like powerful pistons propelling him forward.
meanings.sent5: The quadricepses burned with exertion as she climbed the steep hill.
